meanings.definition: Extremely unpleasant or offensive in smell or taste.
meanings.sent1: The garbage in the bin was the grossest thing I had ever smelled.
meanings.sent2: The spoiled milk had the grossest taste imaginable.
meanings.sent3: The grossest smell from the old socks made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing dumpster emitted the grossest odor, like a rotten egg.
meanings.sent5: The grossest stench filled the room, making us all gag.

meanings.definition: Very obvious or noticeable in a negative way.
meanings.sent1: His lie was the grossest falsehood she had ever heard.
meanings.sent2: The dirt on his face was the grossest thing about him.
meanings.sent3: The grossest mistake he made was wearing mismatched shoes.
meanings.sent4: The gossip spread like the grossest wildfire, consuming everything.
meanings.sent5: The grossest error in the report was hard to miss.

meanings.definition: The highest or most extreme level of something.
meanings.sent1: Reaching the grossest point of exhaustion, he collapsed on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The grossest of all the challenges was yet to come.
meanings.sent3: The competition reached its grossest level of intensity.
meanings.sent4: The suspense in the room was at its grossest peak.
meanings.sent5: The excitement in the crowd was at its grossest height.
